name: WorkPad
slogan: Boutique office space in central London
description:
About WorkPad:

Fast growing workspace business which offers its clients creative and modern solutions in London's most sought after locations. WorkPad provides a platform for start-ups and entrepreneurs to grow.

jobs.title: Sales Support Executive
jobs.description:
We are looking for an ambitious Sales Support Executive to join and grow within our sales team; helping us achieve our goals and continue our successful expansion. You will serve as a point of contact for brokers and customers with queries about our portfolio, providing availability support and CRM administration to the team. From time to time other sales and office management duties may be required. The position with report into the VP of Sales, working closely with the Head of Sales on a daily basis.  


The individual must have excellent customer service skills to identify the best solution within our portfolio to each client. You will need to work effectively as part of a sales team and have excellent time management skills to remain in control of all live opportunities. As an ambassador for WorkPad, you will be expected to be goal-oriented and have a deep knowledge of customer service best practices. You will be accountable for conversion rates from enquiry to viewings arranged, along with managing the ongoing liaison with 3rd party channels. 

Ultimately, you should be able to contribute to high quality customer service, build relationships with 3rd party channels, and have the ambition to grow. Our ideal candidate is if you have exceptional organizational skills and draw energy from being part of a team.

What to expect as our Sales Support Executive? 

•	Be the first point of contact for potential members by telephone, email or leads from the WorkPad website and 3rd party channels.
•	Qualify clients through analysis, pre-call to learn about their business and potential needs 
•	Liaise with the prospective client and confidently qualify
•	Liaise and build relationships with brokers, increasing the quality and quantity of lead inflow
•	Engage in the wider sales process, BDM, Account Management and undertaking office viewings on smaller requirements
•	Assisting with ad-hoc requirements and office management duties 


Requirement:
•	Proven work experience as a Sales Administrator / Sales Support Executive / Sales Executive
•	Hands on experience with CRM software 
•	Understanding of sales performance metrics
•	Excellent organizational and multitasking skills
•	A team player with high level of dedication
•	Ability to work under strict deadlines
•	Certification in Marketing, Sales or relevant field is a plus
